bibl.title: P. Oxy. XXVI 2442 fr. 29: A Citation of Euphorion?
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXVI, 2442 (= Pack2 1360), fr. 29, 1-8 = Schol. in Pind. Paeanem 8 p. 43 Snell-Maehler. At the beginning of line 4 EÈfor€vn does not seem impossible. It would be no surprise to find Euphorion cited by a scholiast for his version of a tale. <Euphorion>
bibl.seg: FOWLER Robert L., P. Oxy. XXVI 2442 fr. 29: A Citation of Euphorion?
